column5: Has anyone fished Reservoir Poisson Blanc in Quebec ? I see an outfitter there called Le Triolet we are considering , looking for any reviews

I have driven by the outfitter the past two years and they look like nice places. My experience is any where you can drive too the fishing is not that good. I prefer fly in outfitters and the fishing has been fantastic. Some drive in you are lucky to catch 20 fish all week. One fly in we caught 530 wallrye in six days.

Scenic lake with some great sand dune beaches. Deepest basin runs 328 feet. Bathymetric maps are available on line at http://www.mern.gouv.qc.ca/outaouais...ymetriques.jsp I only fished it once and landed a nice 14 pound lake trout.
Also possible to view it on the Navionics website: Webapphttp://webapp.navionics.com/?lang=en
